issue.title: [CF 1142] Group Conditions with Icon is Shown not always evaluating properly
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. On a WW monk, Initiate Combat, generate some Chi
2. Cast Tiger Palm for Tiger Power buff
3. Wait and watch the time on the buff

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
When the buff has < 10s remaining, the icon in Group 2 should show (as the group condition of Group 1 is failed and is hidden). Instead, the icon in Group 2 never shows - not even in the 5-10s remaining window of the buff one would expect it to.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
7.4.0 r5 (gc0457b4)

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)
Oddly, changing the group condition to other things sometimes works but sometimes doesn't - I couldn't find a predictable pattern for the behavior. Note that this is a proof of concept for the bug - I do not need "support" in achieving a suitable work-around.
